page.title: 20SUMMARY - MID-WENSLEYDALE
page.content: There are many other things we could have mentioned in our Domesday Project. In our area Village Halls are very important in Community Life. West Burton, Aysgarth & Thoralby all have village halls, which are in regular use for meetings, dances, concerts, evening classes and activities such as badminton, keep fit & country dancing. We could also have studied mobile services, eg mobile shops (the library, greengrocer, butcher, baker & mobile fish & chip shops call each week). The main work has been done by Kate Huntington, Siobhan Pattison, Claire Cooper, Maria Wilson, Sarah Stemmer-Baldwin and David Clarkson, helped by Mrs Beth Miller and Miss Josephine McSweenie. Mrs Sally Stone, Miss Judith Bell and the Junior Class have all helped.
